short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Rate My Professor ratings on the Athena registration page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your essential resource for smarter class registration at UGA! Get instant access to everything you need to know about your professors, right where you need it.

Key Features:
     • See professor ratings instantly while browsing classes
     • View overall ratings, difficulty scores, and "Would Take Again" percentages
     • Access total number of student ratings at a glance
     • Click through to complete Rate My Professors profiles for detailed reviews
     • Real-time data from Rate My Professors

Important Notes:
    • Only compatible with the University of Georgia Athena registration system
    • Performance may vary for large search results
    • Rate My Professors data dependence and limitations apply
